actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Small Business, and in addition to the Committees on Education and the Workforce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Small Business, and in addition to the Committees on Education and the Workforce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Small Business, and in addition to the Committees on Education and the Workforce, and Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To amend the Small Business Act to establish the Entrepreneurship Corps National Service Program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Entrepreneurship Corps for National Service Act

Entrepreneurship Corps for National Service Act
To amend the Small Business Act to establish the Entrepreneurship Corps National Service Program, and for other purposes.
